NO STORE IN DTR MODULE\n 1. This means no schedule was found for your account. Please contact administrator to create your deployment schedule.
NO IMAGE AFTER SELFIE\n 1. Please go to setting of your phone and look for Automat in your applications. Check if all permission is on for camera and storage.
HOW TO CHECK IF DTR WAS SYNCED\n 1. Go to Review DTR (Internet Requeired). Check if your time in/out is in the list.
